verses.verse: And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto<WH413> Moses,<WH4872> Go in<WH935> unto<WH413> Pharaoh:<WH6547> for<WH3588> I<WH589> have hardened<WH3513> <WH853> his heart,<WH3820> and the heart<WH3820> of his servants,<WH5650> that<WH4616> I might show<WH7896> these<WH428> my signs<WH226> before<WH7130> him:

And that<WH4616> thou mayest tell<WH5608> in the ears<WH241> of thy son,<WH1121> and of thy son's<WH1121> son,<WH1121> <WH853> what things<WH834> I have wrought<WH5953> in Egypt,<WH4714> and my signs<WH226> which<WH834> I have done<WH7760> among them; that ye may know<WH3045> how that<WH3588> I<WH589> am the LORD.<WH3068>

And Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> came in<WH935> unto<WH413> Pharaoh,<WH6547> and said<WH559> unto<WH413> him, Thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of the Hebrews,<WH5680> How long<WH5704> <WH4970> wilt thou refuse<WH3985> to humble thyself<WH6031> before<WH4480> <WH6440> me? let my people<WH5971> go,<WH7971> that they may serve<WH5647> me.
Else, <WH3588> if<WH518> thou<WH859> refuse<WH3986> to let<WH853> my people<WH5971> go,<WH7971> behold,<WH2009> tomorrow<WH4279> will I bring<WH935> the locusts<WH697> into thy coast: <WH1366>

And they shall cover<WH3680> <WH853> the face<WH5869> of the earth,<WH776> that one cannot<WH3808> be able<WH3201> to see<WH7200> <WH853> the earth:<WH776> and they shall eat<WH398> <WH853> the residue<WH3499> of that which is escaped,<WH6413> which remaineth<WH7604> unto you from<WH4480> the hail,<WH1259> and shall eat<WH398> <WH853> every<WH3605> tree<WH6086> which groweth<WH6779> for you out of<WH4480> the field: <WH7704>

And they shall fill<WH4390> thy houses,<WH1004> and the houses<WH1004> of all<WH3605> thy servants,<WH5650> and the houses<WH1004> of all<WH3605> the Egyptians;<WH4714> which<WH834> neither<WH3808> thy fathers,<WH1> nor thy fathers'<WH1> fathers<WH1> have seen,<WH7200> since the day<WH4480> <WH3117> that they were<WH1961> upon<WH5921> the earth<WH127> unto<WH5704> this<WH2088> day.<WH3117> And he turned<WH6437> himself, and went out<WH3318> from<WH4480> <WH5973> Pharaoh.<WH6547>

And Pharaoh's<WH6547> servants<WH5650> said<WH559> unto<WH413> him, How long<WH5704> <WH4970> shall this man<WH2088> be<WH1961> a snare<WH4170> unto us? let<WH853> the men<WH376> go,<WH7971> that they may serve<WH5647> <WH853> the LORD<WH3068> their God:<WH430> knowest<WH3045> thou not yet<WH2962> that<WH3588> Egypt<WH4714> is destroyed?<WH6>

And <WH853> Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> were brought again<WH7725> unto<WH413> Pharaoh:<WH6547> and he said<WH559> unto<WH413> them, Go,<WH1980> serve<WH5647> <WH853> the LORD<WH3068> your God:<WH430> but who<WH4310> <WH4310> are they that shall go?<WH1980>

And Moses<WH4872> said,<WH559> We will go<WH1980> with our young<WH5288> and with our old,<WH2205> with our sons<WH1121> and with our daughters,<WH1323> with our flocks<WH6629> and with our herds<WH1241> will we go;<WH1980> for<WH3588> we must hold a feast<WH2282> unto the LORD.<WH3068>

And he said<WH559> unto<WH413> them, Let the LORD<WH3068> be<WH1961> so<WH3651> with<WH5973> you, as<WH834> I will let you go,<WH7971> and your little ones:<WH2945> look<WH7200> to it; for<WH3588> evil<WH7451> is before<WH5048> <WH6440> you.

Not <WH3808> so:<WH3651> go<WH1980> now<WH4994> ye that are men,<WH1397> and serve<WH5647> <WH853> the LORD;<WH3068> for<WH3588> that ye<WH859> did desire.<WH1245> And they were driven out<WH1644> from<WH4480> <WH854> Pharaoh's<WH6547> presence.<WH6440>

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto<WH413> Moses,<WH4872> Stretch out<WH5186> thine hand<WH3027> over<WH5921> the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> for the locusts,<WH697> that they may come up<WH5927> upon<WH5921> the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> and eat<WH398> <WH853> every<WH3605> herb<WH6212> of the land,<WH776> even<WH853> all<WH3605> that<WH834> the hail<WH1259> hath left.<WH7604>

And Moses<WH4872> stretched forth<WH5186> <WH853> his rod<WH4294> over<WH5921> the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> and the LORD<WH3068> brought<WH5090> an east<WH6921> wind<WH7307> upon the land<WH776> all<WH3605> that<WH1931> day,<WH3117> and all<WH3605> that night;<WH3915> and when it was<WH1961> morning,<WH1242> the east<WH6921> wind<WH7307> brought<WH5375> <WH853> the locusts.<WH697>

And the locusts<WH697> went up<WH5927> over<WH5921> all<WH3605> the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> and rested<WH5117> in all<WH3605> the coasts<WH1366> of Egypt:<WH4714> very<WH3966> grievous<WH3515> were they; before<WH6440> them there were<WH1961> no<WH3808> such<WH3651> locusts<WH697> as they, neither<WH3808> after<WH310> them shall be<WH1961> such.<WH3651>

For they covered<WH3680> <WH853> the face<WH5869> of the whole<WH3605> earth,<WH776> so that the land<WH776> was darkened;<WH2821> and they did eat<WH398> <WH853> every<WH3605> herb<WH6212> of the land,<WH776> and all<WH3605> the fruit<WH6529> of the trees<WH6086> which<WH834> the hail<WH1259> had left:<WH3498> and there remained<WH3498> not<WH3808> any<WH3605> green thing<WH3418> in the trees,<WH6086> or in the herbs<WH6212> of the field,<WH7704> through all<WH3605> the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>
Then Pharaoh<WH6547> called<WH7121> for Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> in haste;<WH4116> and he said,<WH559> I have sinned<WH2398> against the LORD<WH3068> your God,<WH430> and against you.

Now <WH6258> therefore forgive,<WH5375> I pray thee,<WH4994> my sin<WH2403> only<WH389> this once,<WH6471> and entreat<WH6279> the LORD<WH3068> your God,<WH430> that he may take away<WH5493> from<WH4480> <WH5921> me this<WH2088> <WH853> death<WH4194> only.<WH7535>
And he went out<WH3318> from<WH4480> <WH5973> Pharaoh,<WH6547> and entreated<WH6279> <WH413> the LORD.<WH3068>

And the LORD<WH3068> turned<WH2015> a mighty<WH3966> strong<WH2389> west<WH3220> wind,<WH7307> which took away<WH5375> <WH853> the locusts,<WH697> and cast<WH8628> them into the Red<WH5488> sea;<WH3220> there remained<WH7604> not<WH3808> one<WH259> locust<WH697> in all<WH3605> the coasts<WH1366> of Egypt.<WH4714>
But the LORD<WH3068> hardened<WH2388> <WH853> Pharaoh's<WH6547> heart,<WH3820> so that he would not<WH3808> let<WH853> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> go.<WH7971>

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto<WH413> Moses,<WH4872> Stretch out<WH5186> thine hand<WH3027> toward<WH5921> heaven,<WH8064> that there may be<WH1961> darkness<WH2822> over<WH5921> the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> even darkness<WH2822> which may be felt.<WH4959>

And Moses<WH4872> stretched forth<WH5186> <WH853> his hand<WH3027> toward<WH5921> heaven;<WH8064> and there was<WH1961> a thick<WH653> darkness<WH2822> in all<WH3605> the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> three<WH7969> days: <WH3117>

They saw<WH7200> not<WH3808> one<WH376> <WH853> another,<WH251> neither<WH3808> rose<WH6965> any<WH376> from his place<WH4480> <WH8478> for three<WH7969> days:<WH3117> but all<WH3605> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> had<WH1961> light<WH216> in their dwellings.<WH4186>

And Pharaoh<WH6547> called<WH7121> unto<WH413> Moses,<WH4872> and said,<WH559> Go<WH1980> ye, serve<WH5647> <WH853> the LORD;<WH3068> only<WH7535> let your flocks<WH6629> and your herds<WH1241> be stayed:<WH3322> let your little ones<WH2945> also<WH1571> go<WH1980> with<WH5973> you.

And Moses<WH4872> said,<WH559> Thou<WH859> must give<WH5414> us<WH3027> also<WH1571> sacrifices<WH2077> and burnt offerings,<WH5930> that we may sacrifice<WH6213> unto the LORD<WH3068> our God.<WH430>

Our cattle<WH4735> also<WH1571> shall go<WH1980> with<WH5973> us; there shall not<WH3808> a hoof<WH6541> be left behind;<WH7604> for<WH3588> thereof<WH4480> must we take<WH3947> to serve<WH5647> <WH853> the LORD<WH3068> our God;<WH430> and we<WH587> know<WH3045> not<WH3808> with what<WH4100> we must serve<WH5647> <WH853> the LORD,<WH3068> until<WH5704> we come<WH935> thither.<WH8033>
But the LORD<WH3068> hardened<WH2388> <WH853> Pharaoh's<WH6547> heart,<WH3820> and he would<WH14> not<WH3808> let them go.<WH7971>

And Pharaoh<WH6547> said<WH559> unto him, Get<WH1980> thee from<WH4480> <WH5921> me, take heed<WH8104> to thyself, see<WH7200> my face<WH6440> no<WH408> more;<WH3254> for<WH3588> in that day<WH3117> thou seest<WH7200> my face<WH6440> thou shalt die.<WH4191>
And Moses<WH4872> said,<WH559> Thou hast spoken<WH1696> well,<WH3651> I will see<WH7200> thy face<WH6440> again<WH3254> no<WH3808> more.<WH5750>
